questions.question: What is the purpose of the common pin in an RGB LED?

explanations.a: Incorrect: Intensity is controlled by PWM signals.
explanations.b: Correct: The common pin is connected to either power or ground. Learn more
explanations.c: Incorrect: Color switching is achieved using individual pins.
explanations.d: Incorrect: Brightness levels depend on PWM.

questions.question: How many pins are typically used to control a 7-segment display?

explanations.b: Correct: 7 pins control individual segments. Learn more
explanations.c: Incorrect: 9 pins might include decimal point.
